PIN.values: |<- gui for convenient manipulation&cr;&lf;supports drag&drop, copy&paste|

|mixing datatypes in one table is possible&cr;&lf;nodes within the category "DataTable Dynamic" automatically create the necessary pins for you&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;in case you are sure of your type handling there are dedicated nodes per type, which are faster&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;as of version 1 some methods are still missing some types|
